mapper.sql: u.id AS user_id, u.name AS user_name, u.img AS user_img, u.sex AS user_sex, u.mobile AS user_mobile, u.password AS user_password, u.open_id AS user_open_id, u.remark AS user_remark, u.create_date AS user_create_date, u.update_date AS user_update_date, u.updated_by_id AS user_updated_by_id, u.updated_by_name AS user_updated_by_name, u.is_deleted AS user_is_deleted
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user( id, `name`, img, sex, mobile, password, open_id, remark, is_deleted, create_date, update_date, updated_by_id, updated_by_name ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{img}, #{sex}, #{mobile}, #{password}, #{openId}, #{remark}, #{deleted.code}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{updatedById}, #{updatedByName} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE update_date = NOW(), is_deleted = #{deleted.code}, updated_by_id = #{updatedById}, updated_by_name = #{updatedByName}
